I encourage @stevenmnuchin1 to extend the April 15 tax filing deadline by 90 days.Seniors have been asked to self-isolate.Many file with the assistance of VITA or tax professionals.We should not ask our most vulnerable population to venture into the public just to file paperwork.

If you are capable of filing taxes from home, please do so. There are free filing options for many Americans. Most Americans are due a refund; file early and put your money back into your pocket.https://t.co/vP1rsYfLHz
